name: tracktor
description: Tracktor is a self-hosted package and shipment tracking web app that aggregates tracking information from multiple carriers, presenting statuses and history in a unified dashboard.
features: Multi-carrier tracking: Track packages from multiple shipping carriers in one unified dashboard.
Automatic updates: Fetch tracking updates automatically at regular intervals without manual checking.
Status aggregation: View all package statuses at a glance with color-coded indicators and summaries.
Delivery notifications: Receive alerts when packages are delivered, out for delivery, or encounter issues.
History tracking: Maintain complete tracking history for all packages including past deliveries.
Carrier detection: Automatically detect carrier from tracking numbers for seamless package addition.
Unified interface: Manage all shipments through a single web interface regardless of carrier.
Search and filter: Find specific packages using search and filter by status, carrier, or date.
Archive management: Archive delivered packages to keep the active list clean while preserving records.
Mobile-friendly: Check package status from mobile devices with a responsive design.
Privacy-focused: Track packages on your own server without sharing tracking data with third parties.
Bulk import: Add multiple tracking numbers at once for efficient package management.
